Articles.Content:
Hello and welcome to my introduction!

I'd like to introduce myself, I go under the alias Megapead on most social networks. I discovered Kerbal Space Program about a year and a half ago from a video posted by Kurtjmac and I've been enjoying the game since. I have had this forum account for about 5-7 months now but, only recently have found out what an awesome place it is. I do run a YouTube channel which has had a mild success in the past few months but, I feel as if I have been neglecting the channel and would like to get back into YouTube in the following days. On this Channel I do Kerbal Space Program but, I would like to not get into talking about my channel as most forums have a separate section for such things (so I'm assuming this forum follows the same format but I can be mistaken). I'm 17 and I am currently studying to be a computer programmer. I have an interest in Physics and Computer Programming so I am planning on working with Physics engines in games (coding them, testing them ect). I am also interested in design rather it be on a computer or picking up a pen and paper and drawing something up. Usually these designs are logos are Graphics if a friend is launching a company and needs something I would usually do it for them. That's essentially my back-story and I can't wait to dive right into your forums and be an active member. Hope to see some of you around and have a pleasant evening (or day where ever you maybe reading this from).
Welcome to the forums, Megapead! It's a pleasure to meet you. I hope you find this place enjoyable.
